definitions.text: a collection containing a variety of sorts of things
examples: a great assortment of cars was on display
he had a variety of disorders
the range and variety of his work is amazing

definitions.text: (biology) a taxonomic category consisting of members of a species that differ from others of the same species in minor but heritable characteristics
examples: varieties are frequently recognized in botany

definitions.text: a show consisting of a series of short unrelated performances
a category of things distinguished by some common characteristic or quality
examples: sculpture is a form of art
what kinds of desserts are there?

definitions.text: a difference that is usually pleasant
examples: he goes to France for variety
it is a refreshing change to meet a woman mechanic
